action_output_list: The user wants to create a playlist in Retro Music. I need to open the app first.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Retro Music Player"}
The user wants to create a new playlist. The current screen shows the songs list. To create a playlist, I need to navigate to the playlists section.{"action_type": "click", "index": 40}
To create a new playlist, I need to tap on the "More options" button.{"action_type": "click", "index": 14}

The user wants to create a new playlist. The current screen shows a menu with options like "New playlist", "Import playlist", and "Settings". To create a new playlist, the "New playlist" option should be clicked.{"action_type": "click", "index": 16}
The user needs to input the name of the playlist. The text field for the playlist name is at index 14.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "Workout", "index": 14}
The user has finished typing the playlist name and needs to create the playlist. The "Create" button is visible and clickable.{"action_type": "click", "index": 18}
To add songs to the playlist, I need to click on the playlist "Workout".{"action_type": "click", "index": 27}
